name: Magnezone LV.X
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Electric Trans
poke_power.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a {L} or {M} Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can’t be used if Magnezone is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Cyber Shock
attacks.effect: Discard a {L} Energy and a {M} Energy attached to Magnezone. The Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Magnezone. Magnezone LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
